lines.text: The war is a terrible thing.
lines.character: Le colonel Jacinthe Chabert aka Jacinthe 'the beggar'

lines.text: Yes, but someone has to defend the fatherland.
Monsieur, I am an old soldier and I think! After everything that I've seen, I shall say that the word "patriotism" means nothing against the word "humanism".
lines.character: Le colonel Jacinthe Chabert aka Jacinthe 'the beggar'
